Sponsor Us

As a 501(c)3 nonprofit, Paly Robotics relies on corporate sponsorships to support all of our operations. Along with covering robot and operational costs, donations support our scholarships, summer camp, and community service projects.

We love our sponsors and are always proud to show them off! Paly Robotics sponsors are featured on all team materials, which are shown in front of thousands of individuals at all of our competitions and outreach events, such as summer camp. We welcome all kinds of support, ranging from in-kind to monetary!

The sponsorship levels are:

  • Bronze - $1000-2499
  • Silver - $2500-4999
  • Gold - $5000

Check out our sponsorship packet for more information.
If you would like to donate money, email us at asoohoo@palyrobotics.com.
Our EIN (Employer Identification Number) is 611682088.
You can also donate via PayPal.


If you would like to donate specific tools or money for those tools, please check out our wishlist page.
